text_block_list.text:
――It's my day off, and I don't have any plans. 
I'm lying comfortably in bed, when my phone suddenly rings.
"Hey, Trainer! You in your room right now?"
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
"Huh? Man, you shouldn't leave your door unlocked! 
Well, it means you're here!"
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Good morning! It's time to set sail, Trainer! Of course you're up for it, right?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Hehe...! You'll see when we get there! 
Don't worry! I brought my adventure map and compass!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
――And that's how I was dragged out of my room on my day off... 
Turns out she wanted to go sightseeing together around the area, 
from tourist attractions to mysterious places.

Anything that invokes her sense of adventure seemed to qualify. 
And so, our journey began...

This is our first stop. 
What do you think, Trainer?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: It looks like any old river...

text_block_list.text:
That's what you'd think, right? But apparently, there's a legend 
that if you can skip a stone across this river for more than 10 hops, 
one of your wishes will come true!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Of course, I wish to be a billionaire! What about you, Trainer?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: For you to win your races... I guess?

text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Not bad, but we're already working on that one right now. 
Don't you have any other wishes?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Legend goes that any wish, no matter how big or small, 
will be granted! So go ahead and shout out your biggest wish!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: <size=31>Then... I wish for a lifetime supply of A5 wagyu beef!</size>

text_block_list.text:
Nahaha! That's a big wish, alright! Perfect! 
Now let's get to it!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
We ended up spending some time skipping stones together. 
A while later, she took me to...
"Topped with everything an Umamusume's heart desires: Chomolungma Ramen." Yep, I'll have that one!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
A Linear Electromagnetic Induction Accelerator Launched Coaster?! 
Dunno what any of that means. Guess we'll have to ride it to find out!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
And so, our journey to anything and everything 
adventurous continued――
We've arrived at the final destination of today's journey.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: I heard this is the habitat of the well-known cryptid: The Manzanebbogefutamatagancho!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Well, I don't know the details. 
But... Apparently it looks like a slime, and can talk...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Hey, don't say that! Sure, it might be a case of 
mistaken identity or a hoax...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
But I don't care if it's real or fake. 
I want to pursue my curiosity! I seek the smell of adventure!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: As the captain of this ship, I'll assure you there'll be no problems! Now, let us lift the anchor of our curiosity!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: ... Hmm? Wait a minute, Trainer!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: That sound... You heard it too, right? Could it be... the Manzanebbogefutamatagancho?!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Her eyes lit up, and she peered into the bushes. 
Then, her expression suddenly froze.

Uh-oh... This is... 
Imma just... slowly back away...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
Well, something that's a bit of a problem... 
Listen... I need you to stay calm...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: It's a wild boar!!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: SQUEAL!
text_block_list.name: Wild Boar

text_block_list.text: Ack...! Make a run for it, Trainer!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Shit! It's faster than us on this rough terrain! What now...?!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Ah! You're right! That's a great idea!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: She quickly leaps up to a tree branch and climbs up. At least she is safe now...

Me, on the other hand... I'm just a human, 
and my strength isn't really something to write home about...!
ROAR!!!
text_block_list.name: Wild Boar

text_block_list.text: Grab on, Trainer!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
I was pulled up by Tap Dance City, and the boar misses me by a hair. 
She jumps from tree to tree, while holding onto me. 
In the end, we manage to escape safely.

Phew! I think we're safe over here... 
Are you alright, Trainer?
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: I thought I was a goner...!

text_block_list.text: But damn, that was very very exciting! But I'm glad we made it out there in one piece!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
You, who gave important advice in a time of crisis, 
and me, the captain who protected her crew... 
We made it work with our combined strengths!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
choice_data_list: Still, let's never do that again...
Still, let's never do that again...

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you're right. 
I'm not a fan of getting chased by wild boars either.
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: Pfft. Ahahahaha!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text:
But man, I sure had a lot of fun today! I really did! 
You know, I realized it again today...
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City

text_block_list.text: That you're the best crewmate I could ever ask for!
text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
